title: Untracker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Untrack someone at night. They get lost in the woods and are roleblocked through immunity. Your ability does not work on astral abilities

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will be notified that they got lost while on their way to their target’s house
- If your target’s ability is reasonably able to start a fire, they will start a forest fire, and the town will be notified that one has started. There may be no execution that day because everyone is too busy putting out the fire
- You may untrack the same player more than once and in a row, however if your ability has already caused a player to start a forest fire, no more fires may take place (since the forest is already burned down)
- This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose (may win while dead)

desc:
Post 4845
_Rasen, where the FUCK are we?_
